courses.title: Beginner Guitar
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano
courses.description: Advanced techniques for piano players looking to take their skills to the next level.

courses.title: Vocal Training
courses.description: Master your vocal techniques and improve your singing with professional tips and exercises.

courses.title: Drum Basics
courses.description: Get started with drums, learn about different rhythms, and practice basic drumming patterns.

courses.title: Music Theory
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and notation.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of improvisation in jazz music, including scales and chord progressions.

courses.title: Songwriting Basics
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of songwriting, including lyrics, melody, and harmony.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create and produce electronic music using popular software and techniques.

courses.title: Classical Guitar
courses.description: Learn classical guitar techniques and play pieces from various eras of classical music.

courses.title: Blues Harmonica
courses.description: Master the blues harmonica with lessons on techniques, scales, and famous licks.

courses.title: Pop Vocals
courses.description: Improve your vocal skills for singing pop music, including breath control and stage presence.

courses.title: Rock Drumming
courses.description: Learn the essentials of rock drumming, including beats, fills, and solo techniques.
